name: write_file
description: Creates or modifies a file with the specified content. Use this when you need to save code, documentation, or any text content to a file.

file_path.description: The path where the file should be created or modified. Can be relative to the working directory or absolute.

content.description: The complete content to write to the file. This will replace any existing content.

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite the file if it already exists. Default is false for safety.
